name: CALIJUEGO
description:
In Calijuego you play as Cali, an eco-terrorist teenage girl who is trying to stop an evil corporation that is replacing their workers with robots.

The game is in spanish, so I'll explain here how to play:

-Move with WASD and jump with SPACE

-You have a double jump. If you wallrun, you lose the double jump and can only walljump

-You can wallrun on wooden walls by running up to them and jumping. You can perform a walljump with SPACE when wallrunning

-Look around with the MOUSE

-Press E to change between the baseball bat and the pistol

-With the pistol equiped, press LEFT CLICK to shoot

-With the baseball bat equiped, press LEFT CLICK to do a basic horizontal attack, Hold and release RIGHT CLICK to do a vertical attack. When the vertical attack hits an enemy, it will propell you upwards. Very useful when doing wallrun sections.

There are three types of enemies:

-Dron: it will stand still in the air and shoot you.

-Amongus: follows you and shoots you

-Armored dron: stands still and is only vulnerable to the vertical attack of the bat

My first ever full game project. I tried to do some kind of movement shooter.

I know there are some bugs, I'm planning on redoing this game from the ground up because I have lots of ideas for it.

The artist of the game Bel
